channel.title: davidbaunach.com
channel.description: The Personal Website of Fr David Baunach

item.title: Consumer Catholicism.txt
item.description: A mini essay about the encrouching of consumeristic tendencies in Catholic practice. Link: https://davidbaunach.com/writings/consumer-catholicism.txt

item.title: Catholic Radicals V1.txt
item.description: Version one of an anarchist board game around the initial ideas of Peter Maurin for what eventually formed as the Catholic Worker. Link: https://davidbaunach.com/writings/catholic-radicals-v1.txt

item.title: Getting Started with Tilde Friends (SSB client and more!).txt
item.description: A walkthrough for setting up Tilde Friends and getting connected to the SSB network. Link: https://davidbaunach.com/writings/tilde-friends-startup.txt
